sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you <radical>poop</radical> on the <radical>root</radical>s of a <radical>building</radical>, the <radical>sound</radical> will <kanji>echo</kanji> all the way through the building, and each and every person in there will know what you did.
meaningInfo: Hear the poop echo. You know what a poop usually sounds like, now imagine that sound again, but louder and with an echo. How could anyone not notice?
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>echo</kanji> doesn't stop there, this building's roots extend throughout the entire city of <ja><reading>きょう</reading>と</ja>. The echo reverberates and soon everyone in <ja>きょうと</ja> is listening, horrified, to your poop.
readingInfo: Welp. <ja>きょうと</ja> knows you pooped. That will echo through your memories for the rest of your life. I hope you're happy.
